item.description:
It's on short notice, but it's all about the fun anyhow.

Are you ready to traverse the many ins-and-outs of Mt. Washington Valley and work it like the pros? Know the best way to come into and leave the North Conway area? Know the best way to get access to Attitash? What time to get to the mountain and how to get the best parking spot? Where the best equipment shops are, where to get the best ski or board tuneup and where to get your boots fitted by the best in the Valley? Cheapest rental equipment? Best restaurants? Apres Ski? Best Bloody Mary?

Join the Innitou Ski Runners, a ski club in continuous operation since 1938, for a weekend in the Mt. Washington Valley meeting new people, learning new things, skiing or boarding and having outdoor fun.

It's a long weekend so three nights are available!


Costs

$20 per night for lodging for three nights = $60

$52 per day for two days at Bretton Woods = $104

The sum is $164. If less nights are stayed, we'll adjust on site.

We must know about skiing selection by Thursday PM

 

What we will provide

  • Separate bunk room accommodations and shower facilities for men and women
  • Three nights of lodging, Fri/Sat/Sun depart on Monday
  • Lift tickets for two full days of skiing at Bretton Woods
  • Electricity, Heat and Hot Water
  • Free Parking
  • Cooking facilities if you plan to cook for yourself
  • A place for your cooler or refrigerator access for your food
  • A place to lock up your skis or board when not in use

 

What you will need to bring

  • A pillow and a good blanket
  • Toiletries
  • Skis or a board if you own one
  • Suitable clothing for being outdoors in the cold
  • Food if you don' to plan to eat outside of the club
  • Drinks
  • A sense of humor!

When

  • Starts Friday 2/17/12 at 8PM
  • Ends Monday 2/20/12 around noon (Most of you have Presidents Day off!)

Requirements

  • We collect all fees upon check in at our lodge
  • Cash, money orders, travelers checks, paypal or cash please!
  • A sense of humor
  • Ready to rip it up on the Mountain and have fun!

group.name: Innitou Ski Runners & Rider's Activities Club of New England

item.name: Long Weekend Fun! Skiing or Snow Boarding Mt. Washington Valley
